trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Klassen FormsAuthenticationEventArgs brukes til å oppgi hendelsen verdier for den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen, og slik at du kan angi en egendefinert ID. for gjeldende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a FormsAuthenticationEventArgs object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>bygger et FormsAuthenticationEventArgs objekt med gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, og sender den til den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>til å angi den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>til en egendefinert <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>egenskapen under den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen, identiteten som ble levert av skjemaer godkjenningsbilletten URL-adresse og informasjonskapsel brukes.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: Den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen er bare aktiveres når godkjenningen <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>og <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>er en aktive HTTP-modul for applikasjonen.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the supplied `context` as the value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>bygger en <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>objekt med den angitte `context` som verdien for den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objekt for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>gir tilgang til <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>objekter for gjeldende forespørsel.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objekt for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet som skal knyttes til gjeldende forespørsel.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: You can use the User property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen for bruker til å angi den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>til en egendefinert <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the User property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for egenskapen for bruker i løpet av **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen, identiteten som ble levert av skjemaer godkjenningsbilletten URL-adresse og informasjonskapsel brukes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet som skal knyttes til gjeldende forespørsel.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>
